name: A Tail of Alchemy
description:
Oh no! The snake thinks it's a snack! Grab the items with your mouse and mix them in the alchemy circle to see what can do to prevent the snake from harming itself!

Made by:

  • Christian Rigstad (Oroh) - Game Design + Menu Design & Lighting
  • Justin (pixpeel)  - Programming (Snake)
  • BananaBoat - Programming (Inventory / Item Spawning)
  • Southocean - Programming (Crafting)
  • Laurence (Watusi) - 3D Models
  • Spiffy664 - 3D Models
  • Alessandro (alexzen) - Music

Assets used:

  • https://kenney.nl/assets/ui-pack-rpg-expansion for menu button textures
  • https://www.kisspng.com/png-edward-elric-nuclear-transmutation-magic-circle-al-7... Alchemy circle image used in Main Menu
